statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_patient_information;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM sensitive_patient_information ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM sensitive_patient_information WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, patient_ssn, address FROM sensitive_patient_information WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, phone_number FROM sensitive_patient_information WHERE patient_ssn IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_patient_information WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_ssn FROM sensitive_patient_information WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM sensitive_patient_information WHERE patient_id > 3 AND address LIKE '%St%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM sensitive_patient_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 2;
SELECT patient_name, patient_ssn, address FROM sensitive_patient_information WHERE patient_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'A%';
SELECT patient_id, record_date, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_address LIKE '%Ave%';

SELECT record_id, patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords JOIN Patients ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis = 'Hypertension' ORDER BY record_date DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, COUNT(MedicalRecords.record_id) AS num_records FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name HAVING num_records > 5;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY doctor_id ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2021-10-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_department FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Doctors.doctor_name FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, department FROM Doctors;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT user_id, role, permissions FROM AccessControl;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, department FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address, medical_record FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, department FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC, doctor_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, address, medical_record FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
